statements: SELECT * FROM password_policies
SELECT user_id, password_expiry FROM password_policies ORDER BY password_expiry DESC
SELECT user_id, password_complexity FROM password_policies WHERE password_complexity = 'Strong'
SELECT * FROM password_policies WHERE password_expiry >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT user_id, password FROM password_policies WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT * FROM password_policies WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, password_expiry FROM password_policies WHERE password_complexity = 'Strong';
SELECT user_id, password_expiry FROM password_policies WHERE password_complexity = 'Medium' ORDER BY password_expiry DESC;
SELECT user_id, password_complexity FROM password_policies WHERE password_expiry > '2022-01-01' AND password_complexity = 'Weak';
SELECT user_id, password_complexity, password_expiry FROM password_policies WHERE password_expiry BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY password_expiry ASC;
SELECT * FROM password_policies;
SELECT id, min_length, min_uppercase FROM password_policies WHERE min_length > 8;
SELECT user_id, min_digits, min_special_chars FROM password_policies WHERE min_special_chars = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_passwords ORDER BY last_changed DESC;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM user_passwords WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM password_policies;
SELECT id, user_id, min_length FROM password_policies WHERE min_length > 8 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(min_special_chars) AS max_special_chars FROM password_policies GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS password_count FROM user_passwords GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(*) > 3 ORDER BY password_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM user_passwords WHERE last_changed > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_changed ASC;
SELECT id, username FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, last_login FROM users ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM password_policies WHERE special_chars_required = TRUE;
SELECT u.username, p.policy_name FROM users u JOIN user_policy_mapping m ON u.id = m.user_id JOIN password_policies p ON p.policy_id = m.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE last_login < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.policy_name FROM users u JOIN user_policy_mapping upm ON u.id = upm.user_id JOIN password_policies p ON upm.policy_id = p.policy_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(upm.policy_id) AS policy_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_policy_mapping upm ON u.id = upm.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING policy_count > 1;

SELECT u.username, p.policy_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_policy_mapping upm ON u.id = upm.user_id INNER JOIN password_policies p ON upm.policy_id = p.policy_id WHERE p.special_chars_required = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT password FROM users WHERE username='admin';
SELECT * FROM password_rules WHERE min_length >= 8 AND require_lowercase = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, change_date FROM password_history WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM password_rules WHERE min_length > 8 AND require_special_chars = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, change_date FROM password_history WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT user_id, request_date FROM password_reset_requests ORDER BY request_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL;
SELECT username, last_login FROM Users ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM PasswordHistory WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT Users.username, UserRoles.role_name FROM Users INNER JOIN UserRolesMapping ON Users.user_id = UserRolesMapping.user_id INNER JOIN UserRoles ON UserRolesMapping.role_id = UserRoles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM Users WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL;
SELECT Users.username, PasswordHistory.change_date FROM Users INNER JOIN PasswordHistory ON Users.user_id = PasswordHistory.user_id;
SELECT Users.username, UserRoles.role_name FROM Users INNER JOIN UserRolesMapping ON Users.user_id = UserRolesMapping.user_id INNER JOIN UserRoles ON UserRolesMapping.role_id = UserRoles.role_id;
SELECT Users.username, COUNT(PasswordHistory.password_id) AS num_password_changes FROM Users LEFT JOIN PasswordHistory ON Users.user_id = PasswordHistory.user_id GROUP BY Users.username;
